goal.en: The aim of this course is to train the graduate students to read papers and establish their capacity of independent thinking.
goal.ch: 訓練研究生閱讀論文的能力, 並培養獨立思考的習慣

content.en: This course will mainly cover the following topics:1. describes the latest developments in the field of mathematics branch.2. related literature studyguide.3. study of individual topics.
content.ch: 本課程主要涵蓋下面主題 :1.介紹數學分支領域最新進展。2.相關文獻研讀指導。3.個別主題的研究報告。

flex_desc.ch: 第17、18周的教學活動將以自主學習、補充教學以及補救教學方式進行。

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Others
